name: Mini Game - DeLorean Racing
description:
The game is a prototype based on the old racing games (Top-Down Style). Inspired by the Ultimate Racing 2D game, which was considered the best top-down racing game, with 35 racing classes and over 45 tracks!

Controls:

Or

For the player to move the DeLorean in "Horizontal".

➤ Tools and Technologies Used:

    - Unity 2D

Tool (Game Engine or Game Engine) that allows you to create games for different platforms (PC, consoles, mobile, VR and AR) using a visual editor and programming through scripting.

    - Ç#

Strongly typed, multi-paradigm programming language developed by Microsoft as part of the .NET platform.

    - Visual Studio

Microsoft's integrated development environment for software development especially dedicated to the .NET Framework and Visual Basic, C, C++, C# and F# languages.
